title: [Rotorua]
brief_description: Incomplete film with no title describing New Zealand. Shows footage of town of Rotorua and varius geysers and mud pools, Maori children at play in thermal pools, Maori women cooking over steaming geysers. Accompanied by explanatory narration. Also includes footage of Waikato River but film abruptly stops in mid-sentence.
